title: [DOC] Update changelog for v0.9.0
body:
Update CHANGELOG.rst in docs with the below content. 

To replace md references with rst references you can use this script: https://gist.github.com/mloning/d865ebe30fbb32cae89e9ab02427c1af

---
## What's Changed
* Add freddyaboulton to core developers list by @freddyaboulton in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1559
* Update docs from roadmap planning sessions by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1527
* Governance: eligibility and end of tenure clarification by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1573
* Add toggle button to make examples easy to copy by @RNKuhns in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1572
* Update release script by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1562
* [DOC] additions to forecaster extension template by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1535
* Fix Performance metric bug that affects repr by @RNKuhns in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1566
* Add missing classes to API reference by @RNKuhns in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1571
* Deprecate various by @TonyBagnall in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1548
* Feature based classification package refactor by @MatthewMiddlehurst in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1545
* Distance based classification package refactor by @MatthewMiddlehurst in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1584
* Interval based classification package refactor  by @MatthewMiddlehurst in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1583
* TimeSeriesForest Classifier Fix by @OliverMatthews in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1588
* Classifier test speed ups by @MatthewMiddlehurst in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1599
* load from UCR fix by @TonyBagnall in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1610
* convert 2D to 3D rather than throw exception by @TonyBagnall in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1604
* Fixes #1234 by @Carlosbogo in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1600
* Added myself as contributor by @Carlosbogo in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1602
* Delete release-drafter.yml by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1561
* Fix STLTransformer docstring and attribute by @aiwalter in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1611
* [BUG] fixing bug for `_split` (accidental removal of `pandas.Index` support) by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1582
* Ets strictly pos mul models by @chernika158 in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1615
* Experiments tidy by @TonyBagnall in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1619
* Dynamic time warping - aligners and distances by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1264
* Numba numpy by @TonyBagnall in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1623
* Updated classification base class typing. by @chrisholder in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1633
* Integrate multi rocket by @fstinner in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1567
* Numba distance module by @chrisholder in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1574
* Update installation.rst by @MrPr3ntice in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1636
* fix parameter mismatch in ShapeDTW by @TonyBagnall in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1638
* fix issue with update_y_X when we refit forecaster by @ltsaprounis in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1595
* Transformers refactor by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1365
* Windows installation guide for sktime development with Anaconda and PyCharm by @jasonlines in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1640
* Refactor the `_diff_transform` function to be compatible with pandas 1.3.4 by @lmmentel in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1644
* Fix `test_wilcoxon` compatibility between pandas versions by @lmmentel in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1653
* AutoARIMA access fitted order and seasonal order under get_fitted_params by @AngelPone in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1641
* [DOC] fix docstring in Feature Union by @AreloTanoh in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1470
* MiniRocket and MultiRocket as options for RocketClassifier by @MatthewMiddlehurst in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1637
* Distance metric refinement by @chrisholder in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1664
* Fix `FeatureUnion` test failure by @lmmentel in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1665
* Misstyping by @marcio55afr in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1671
* Add clone in evaluate by @ltsaprounis in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1670
* Fix appveyor by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1669
* [BUG] Fixes to registry look-up, test suite for registry look-up by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1648
* Fix Imputer. Added Imputer tests by @aiwalter in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1666
* [BUG] Bugfix alignment tests by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1661
* Fix ColumnwiseTransformer example by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1681
* Replace time.time with time.perf_counter by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1680
* Add links to estimator overview to README by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1691
* Rename check_is to check_is_mtype by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1692
* [BUG] Fix `convert` and `_split` for Numpy 1D input by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1650
* [DOC] Update Prophet and ETS docstrings by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1698
* [FIX] Add missing init files by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1695
* Added meta-tuning example to docstring of ForecastingGridSearchCV by @aiwalter in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1656
* [DOC] Update Time series forest regression docstring by @thayeylolu in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/800
* check_is_scitype, cleaning up dists_kernels input checks/conversions by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1704
* [MNT] Fail CI on missing init files by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1699
* Fixes prophet bug concerning the internal change of exogenous X by @kejsitake in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1711
* [ENH] transformer base class to allow multivariate output if input is always univariate by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1706
* transformers refactor: summarizer and base class by @fkiraly in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1663
* Release v0.9.0 by @mloning in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1682

## New Contributors
* @OliverMatthews made their first contribution in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1588
* @Carlosbogo made their first contribution in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1600
* @chernika158 made their first contribution in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1615
* @fstinner made their first contribution in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1567
* @MrPr3ntice made their first contribution in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1636
* @lmmentel made their first contribution in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1644
* @AngelPone made their first contribution in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1641
* @marcio55afr made their first contribution in https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/pull/1671

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/sktime/compare/v0.8.1...v0.9.0
